Hi there: Thanks for reaching out to Ghostery!
There are actually two ways how you can manage the trackers being blocked in the Ghostery extension. Here are steps to follow:
Click on the Ghostery icon to open a quick panel.
Click on the 3 stacked lines to open the extension menu.

column2: you have access to all trackers included to block lists.

Hi there: Click on the Ghostery icon to open a quick panel.
Click on the detailed view button.

column2: you can manage detected trackers across categories and allow or block those for this specific website.
